alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Northern Ware; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 8:01PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pierce, southwestern Brantley and east central Ware Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 800 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nahunta, moving southwest at 10 mph. Other storms were just west of Hoboken moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nahunta, Hickox, Braganza and Fort Mudge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
